item.title: Example: Partial - linked assets
item.description: This example uses partials in a template. The style and script assets are linked. The script asset uses a global version of the Vue library. The template asset is rendered in the div#sfc element directly.

item.title: Example: Shortcode - inlined assets
item.description: This example uses shortcodes in a post. The style and script assets are inlined. The script asset includes its own version of the Vue library. The template asset is rendered in the div#sfc element directly.

item.title: Example: Shortcode - linked assets
item.description: This example uses shortcodes in a post. The style and script assets are linked. The script asset uses a global version of the Vue library. The template asset is rendered in a x-template script that gets used by the vue component.
